meanings.definition: To move or shake the body from side to side in a quick, jerky motion.
meanings.sent1: She was shimmying her way through the crowded dance floor.
meanings.sent2: The palm trees were shimmying in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel looked like it was shimmying up the tree for a hidden acorn.
meanings.sent4: The old car's engine was shimmying as it struggled up the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The excited puppy was shimmying with joy as its owner returned home.

meanings.definition: A dance move involving shaking the body from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The shimmying at the party got everyone on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: Her shimmying in the talent show won her first place.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's shimmying at the zoo entertained the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The shimmying of the leaves in the wind created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The shimmying of the hula dancers added a festive vibe to the luau.
